Read and parse yaml configuration file

read_yaml_config.Rd

Read and parse yaml configuration file

Usage

read_yaml_config(file, set_env = TRUE)

Arguments

file

character Path to yaml file

set_env

logical Should environment variables from the yaml file be set. Default is TRUE.

Value

Configuration list with all content evaluated

Examples

yaml_file <- system.file("config", "test_env_config.yml", package = "connector")
yaml::read_yaml(yaml_file, eval.expr = TRUE) |> str()
#> List of 4
#>  $ metadata   :List of 4
#>   ..$ trial      : chr "demo_trial"
#>   ..$ root_path  : chr "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector"
#>   ..$ extra_class: chr "{env.hello}"
#>   ..$ R          : chr "{env.R_HOME}"
#>  $ env        :List of 3
#>   ..$ hello      : chr "world"
#>   ..$ RSQLite_db : chr ":memory:"
#>   ..$ system_path: chr "path: {env.PATH}"
#>  $ connections:List of 2
#>   ..$ :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ con    : chr "adam_fs"
#>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3
#>   .. .. ..$ type       : chr "connector_fs"
#>   .. .. ..$ path       : chr "{metadata.root_path}/{metadata.trial}/adam"
#>   .. .. ..$ extra_class: chr "{metadata.extra_class}"
#>   ..$ :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ con    : chr "general_dbi"
#>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3
#>   .. .. ..$ type  : chr "connector_dbi"
#>   .. .. ..$ drv   : chr "RSQLite::SQLite()"
#>   .. .. ..$ dbname: chr "{env.RSQLite_db}"
#>  $ datasources:List of 2
#>   ..$ :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ name: chr "adam"
#>   .. ..$ con : chr "adam_fs"
#>   ..$ :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ name: chr "sdtm"
#>   .. ..$ con : chr "general_dbi"
config <- read_yaml_config(yaml_file)
str(config)
#> List of 4
#>  $ metadata   :List of 4
#>   ..$ trial      : chr "demo_trial"
#>   ..$ root_path  : chr "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector"
#>   ..$ extra_class: chr "world"
#>   ..$ R          : chr "/opt/R/4.4.1/lib/R"
#>  $ env        :List of 3
#>   ..$ hello      : chr "world"
#>   ..$ RSQLite_db : chr ":memory:"
#>   ..$ system_path: chr "path: /opt/hostedtoolcache/pandoc/3.1.11/x64:/snap/bin:/home/runner/.local/bin:/opt/pipx_bin:/home/runner/.carg"| __truncated__
#>  $ connections:List of 2
#>   ..$ :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ con    :List of 1
#>   .. .. ..$ : chr "adam_fs"
#>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3
#>   .. .. ..$ type       : chr "connector_fs"
#>   .. .. ..$ path       : chr "/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/connector/demo_trial/adam"
#>   .. .. ..$ extra_class: chr "world"
#>   ..$ :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ con    :List of 1
#>   .. .. ..$ : chr "general_dbi"
#>   .. ..$ backend:List of 3
#>   .. .. ..$ type  : chr "connector_dbi"
#>   .. .. ..$ drv   : chr "RSQLite::SQLite()"
#>   .. .. ..$ dbname: chr ":memory:"

#>   .. ..$ con : chr "general_dbi"
Sys.getenv("hello")
